Title: Relates to the canvass of absentee, military and special ballots
Summary: Provides that the determination of the board of elections to issue a voter an absentee, military or special ballot shall only be challenged by a judicial proceeding in supreme court and that the board of elections and the voter whose application is challenged shall be necessary parties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the canvass of absentee, military and special ballots
